stimulusHtml: The artist who painted the Greek vase shown created a sense of naturalism by using

features.html: Louvre, Paris, France © Peter Willi / Bridgeman Images

choicesHtml: hot wax mixed with pigments to create rich layers of colors
single-point perspective to create an illusion of depth
shading to create a sense of volumetric form and mass
fine lines to depict the muscles and contours of the figure’s body
